dmca.title: Poem Posted in Google Groups
dmca.body:
[private]
[private]
Springfield, Illinois 62703
Phone: xxx-xxx-xxxx
E-Mail: [private]@disarranging.com

August 25, 2003

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

RE: Notice of Copyright Infringement in Google Groups

Dear Friends:

	Please be advised that one of my original works has been improperly posted in groups.google.com without my permission. The message ID is:

<19981124050207.10541.00000003@ng-cf1.aol.com>

The entire post, except for the last two lines as follows:

Hankie,
There's no price tag on the words "I love You" and "Thank You"

is my original work. I hereby respectfully request that you remove same from your web site. Thank you very much for your cooperation. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me at [private]@disarranging.com.

	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Yours truly

[private]
